channel.title: Pi help
channel.description:
Hey guys I just added loyalty titles but whenever you talk it does this.
*postion crown here*(players name here): Whatever they typed *Loyalty title here*(players name here): Whatever they typed.
So it send 2 messages at the same time but I want it so it is just like this.
*postion crown here**loyalty title here*(players name here): Whatever they typed.
Can anybody help me fix this?

item.title: Pi help
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Hey guys I just added loyalty titles but whenever you talk it does this.

postion crown here(players name here): Whatever they typed
Loyalty title here(players name here): Whatever they typed.

So it send 2 messages at the same time but I want it so it is just like this.

postion crown here**loyalty title here(players name here): Whatever they typed.

Can anybody help me fix this?

Read full topic
